mdRecord.dcterms:title: D.W. Griffith Centennial Film Festival
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for D.W. Griffith Centennial Film Festival. With visiting scholar Dr. David Thaxton. Four Evenings of Classic Silent Film Drama: The Adventures of Dollie | A Corner in Wheat | What Drink Did | The Modern Prodigal | The Last Drop of Water | The Massacre | The Musketeers of Pig Valley | Broken Blossoms | The Mother and The Law | The Birth of A Nation
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Department of Performing Arts and Communications
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Silent films
Virginia
